starts.title: Both players muss up their own hair
Both players smear food around their mouths
starts.extra: Help each other apply the food

examples.title: Both players muss up each other's hair playfully
examples.extra: Freeze your 'wild hair' faces for 3 seconds

examples.title: Both players stack napkins as costumes
examples.extra: Walk a mini runway together

examples.title: Both players air‑paint a stripe on each other's cheek
examples.extra: Add a second swirl in the air

examples.title: Both players draw ketchup or mustard mustaches (tiny dab)
examples.extra: Add a matching dot on each other's cheek

examples.title: Both players put a tiny whipped‑cream 'cloud' on your own nose, then show each other
examples.extra: Gently wipe each other's noses

examples.title: Both players frame each other's face with messy 'stage makeup' (washable, small)
examples.extra: Pose forehead‑to‑forehead for 3 seconds

examples.title: Both players make a 'messy face' selfie pose
examples.extra: Smudge your own cheek a little more

examples.title: Current player traces a short face‑paint line on the other's cheek (washable)
examples.extra: Switch and add one more accent line

examples.title: Both players dab a tiny dot of sauce on each other's fingertip, then boop noses
examples.extra: Trade a second boop

examples.title: Both players build a tiny food tower (safe items)
examples.extra: Balance it for 5 seconds before collapsing it

examples.title: Both players wear paper‑towel 'capes' and strike a hero pose
examples.extra: Add a ketchup 'badge' (tiny dab) to each other's cape

examples.title: Current player draws a washable dot on the other's hand
examples.extra: Switch and add a second dot

examples.title: Current player finger‑paints a small heart on the other's cheek (washable)
examples.extra: Switch; then hug carefully for 2 seconds

examples.title: Both players put on 'clown cheeks' (two small dabs) in a mirror
examples.extra: Pose cheek‑to‑cheek for 2 seconds

examples.title: Both players finger‑paint a small heart on each other's forearm (washable)
examples.extra: Outline it once more

examples.title: Current player gives the other a 'messy chef' stripe on the cheek (washable)
examples.extra: Switch and add a second stripe

examples.title: Both players decorate each other's hands with ketchup/mustard dots
examples.extra: Connect two dots with a line

examples.title: Both players sprinkle a tiny pinch of safe sprinkles or glitter‑confetti on each other's sleeve
examples.extra: Brush it off dramatically

examples.title: Current player draws a washable swirl on the other's wrist
examples.extra: Switch and add a star

examples.title: Both players swap messy 'chef hats' made of napkins
examples.extra: Add one funny flair each

examples.title: Both players put a tiny chocolate or syrup dot on each other's palm
examples.extra: Lick your own palm clean slowly

examples.title: Current player adds a washable 'war stripe' to the other's cheek
examples.extra: Switch and add under‑eye dots

examples.title: Both players gesture a 'paint roller' across each other's back (over clothes)
examples.extra: Add a second 'coat'

examples.title: Both players draw a washable smile on each other's shoulder (over clothes if marker)
examples.extra: Pose shoulder‑to‑shoulder

examples.title: Current player gently powders the other's sleeve with a tiny pinch of flour (if available)
examples.extra: Switch and write an initial with fingertip

examples.title: Both players put a tiny shaving‑cream swirl on each other's knuckle
examples.extra: Remove it for each other with a napkin

examples.title: Both players face‑paint a mini 'team mark' on each other's cheek (washable)
examples.extra: Press cheeks together for 2 seconds

examples.title: Current player decorates the other's hand with sauce dots then 'connects' them
examples.extra: Switch roles and add one more connection

examples.title: Both players add a tiny dab of whipped cream on each other's nose and smile
examples.extra: Hold nose‑to‑nose without touching for 3 seconds

examples.title: Both players make your messiest selfie faces together
examples.extra: Cheek‑to‑cheek and snap again
